name: Birds vs The World (v0)
description:
This is Birds vs THE WORLD!!!

Assets by Kenny https://kenney.nl/assets

Music made in Chrome music lab

Info about towers and enemies

Towers:

  • Parrot: Shoots terrifying snake projectiles, best with a lot of other parrots (300 cash)
  • Penguin: A freezing cold tundra surrounds it, slows enemies greatly, best in a crevice (500 cash)
  • Duck (not in the game yet)
  • Owl (not in the game yet)

Enemies:

  • Pig: True neutral of the enemies, normal speed, 5 hp
  • Giraffe:  Really fast, but cold will defeat it instantly, 3 hp
  • Frog: Ribbit or something, slow and bulky, 9 hp
  • Monkey: Epic, very fast, 1 hp
  • Red Giraffe: Giraffe but immune to fridges
  • Crocodile: HOW CROCODIL MOVE SO FAST?!?!?!? 2 hp
  • Whale: Slow and gets progressively stronger, starts at 40 hp, has a maximum of around 1000 hp, idk but that sounds like a lot
